text: "Russians" is a 1985 song by Sting and is the fourth single from their debut studio album The Dream of the Blue Turtles. It went to number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 16 in the United States and Sweden, number 13 in Switzerland, number 1 in Italy, number 4 in France, number 2 in Germany, number 8 in the Netherlands, number 7 in Belgium, number 25 in New Zealand and number 35 in Canada. ==Track listings== ; 7″ single # "Russians" – 3:57 # "Gabriel's Message" – 2:15 ; 12″ maxi # "Russians" – 3:57 # "Gabriel's Message" – 2:10 # "I Burn for You" (live) – 4:40 == References == Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Sting (musician) songs
title: Russians (song)
